original_text: The king of Assyria will take away people from Egypt as prisoners. He will do the same thing to the people of Cush. Young people and old people will go as prisoners to Assyria. They will not wear any clothes or shoes. People will see their bare bodies. The Egyptians will be very ashamed.
korean_text: 이와 같이 애굽의 포로와 구스의 사로잡힌 자가 앗수르 왕에게 끌려갈 때에 젊은 자나 늙은 자가 다 벗은 몸과 벗은 발로 볼기까지 드러내어 애굽의 수치를 보이리니

sentences.original_text: The king of Assyria will take away people from Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 왕이 이집트에서 사람들을 데려갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will do the same thing to the people of Cush
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 구스 사람들에게도 똑같은 일을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Young people and old people will go as prisoners
sentences.korean_translation: 젊은 사람들과 늙은 사람들이 포로로 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will not wear any clothes or shoes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 옷이나 신발을 신지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: People will see their bare bodies
The Egyptians will be very ashamed
